LanguageData.DNADL_RealtimeTT: With realtime enabled: Letters will be dismissed after a set amount of realtime, with it disabled: Letters will be dismissed after a set amount of ingame time
LanguageData.DNADL_Sound: Play the default sound when a letter is removed:
LanguageData.DNADL_CheckEverySeconds: How often the mod should check for dismissal (in seconds):
LanguageData.DNADL_DismissLetterAgeReal: How old should a letter be (in seconds) before it is deleted:
LanguageData.DNADL_DismissLetterAgeTick: How old should a letter be (in ticks) before it is deleted:
